alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Gallatin; Jefferson; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 4:35PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lewis and Clark, Broadwater, Meagher, Jefferson, and northern Gallatin Counties through 530 PM MDT... At late afternoon, thunderstorms were occurring across the region. Any storms this afternoon may briefly become strong and may produce locally gusty winds, small hail, and occasional lightning. Movement will generally be to the east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Helena, Townsend, Boulder, White Sulphur Springs, East Helena, Three Forks, Manhattan, Whitehall, Montana City, Basin, Toston, Fort Logan On The Smith River, York, Rimini, Alhambra, Corbin, Spring Meadow Lake State Park, Austin, Fort Logan and Missouri Headwaters State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If on or near a lake, be prepared to get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle if a thunderstorm approaches. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter if storms approach.
